column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is one of the best in the city for Tapas style food. The Cafe offers a wide variety of dishes for everyone's pallet. They have wine flights
column3: and great deals on sangria pitchers. If you don't want to sit at a table
column4: the place also has an extensive bar with TVs. While the place is pretty big
column5: you will likely want to get a reservation as this place is pretty popular. If you are lucky
column6: you may be able to snag one of the 2 tables that are located outside. Bring your friends and you won't be disappointed.
